name: Chocolanator
description: Everything was normal for a little ol' Town Named Zer0 Falls Everything was normal till a mad scientist mad a potion that made Zombies come back to life but a dog went into the science lad and the chemical fell into a machine that spreds things through one Town the dog knocked down some pens and typed in Zeer fll and the machine auto corrected it to Zer0 Falls With that happening every dog in Zer0 Falls Turned into a Zombie that gets destroyed by Choclete Its up to you to Fight The DOGs!!!
